page-05.png: Asha: The Signal “Usually translated as ‘Truth. This word is too small. It is an ontological term. It describes the physics of reality: the precise orbital mechanics of the stars, the proper flow of the seasons, the structural integrity of a promise. It is the perfect, low-entropy state of a system.” Gi i> Ce

page-13.png: F vi A peter nett te Se = ree” meinen ieee tenement ee einen ater a | The Thermodynamics of Truth | To the Achaemenid kings, rebellion was the work of Drauga—The Lie. A lie is an act of ontological vandalism. It injects noise into the communication channel, forcing others to act on a false map of reality. A society where lying is common is a high-friction system.
